quest.name: It Can Be Cruel Sometimes
journal:
Alpa's list of quandaries grows ever longer.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

An Ala Mhigan traveler returning to his homeland has fallen ill while staying at Castellum Velodyna. While Alpa and J'olhmyn are discussing his condition, M'zhet Tia, self-proclaimed future nunh of the M tribe, makes an unexpected appearance and reveals that he has in fact volunteered to aid the Gatekeepers. He also claims that the stricken guest is in fact lovesick, a concept Alpa finds hard to grasp. With total disregard for more immediate concerns, M'zhet asks the group to meet him at Pike Falls, where he will demonstrate the power of love.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

After gathering an audience, the would-be nunh of the M tribe insists that the power of love can protect him from anything, including imperial grenades. In spite of Alpa's apparent concern, he asks you to pelt him with explosives in order to prove his point. He also makes it clear that he wants you to continue throwing, even if he tells you to stop.

M'zhet was supposed to have removed some of the powder from the grenades to reduce their destructive force. However, it seems he neglected to do so, resulting in a powerful blast. Of course, it is entirely possible that the remaining explosives will produce the desired effect...
You confirm that the grenades still contain the original amount of powder. Although M'zhet seems to be in a considerable amount of pain, you prepare to throw some more.

M'zhet miraculously survives the final grenade while J'olhmyn comes to the conclusion that the power of love has little to do with one's resilience to explosions. Meanwhile, the bedridden traveler has still not received any treatment, so the group decides to call on the expertise of Orella, the Resistance's resident physician.

Orella has a hunch that the disease can be cured with a mixture that includes lightning caps. However, Orella's stock has been depleted, so you head to East End with Alpa to gather these rare mushrooms.
While gathering lightning caps, Alpa is suddenly attacked by deadly flora. Luckily, you arrive to prevent her untimely demise. After disposing of the woodland predators, you rush to her aid.

It seems that only Alpa's pride was wounded and she recovers quickly. Despite her unfortunate encounter, the lightning caps she has gathered are still intact. All that remains is to deliver them to Orella at Castellum Velodyna.

You return to the castellum, where Alpa informs you that she has given the mushrooms to Orella. The medicine that she prepares takes effect with astonishing rapidity, healing the stricken traveler almost instantly. However, he reveals that he is suffering from lovesickness following his encounter with Orella and chases after her to confess his feelings. If Alpa has learned anything from this episode, it is that even in times of relative peace, people are still prone to injury and disease. She comes to the conclusion that an infirmary would be a worthy addition to the castellum.
objectives: Speak with M'zhet Tia at Pike Falls.
Throw a Mark XLII grenade at M'zhet Tia.
Throw another Mark XLII grenade at M'zhet Tia.
Throw yet another Mark XLII grenade at M'zhet Tia.
Speak with Orella in Rhalgr's Reach.
Rendezvous with Alpa in East End.
Speak with Alpa at Castellum Velodyna.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Oh, there you are, Forename. We have the latest report on Mother's molting. J'olhmyn, if you'd be ssso kind?

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: "The broodmother's skin has become dry and slightly rough.“

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: She'll be shedding her ssskin before long.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: I'm not worried though. Even if Mother were to arrive now, I think the castellum would pass muster. The guest rooms we made have proven quite popular!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Yes, but you're forgetting one thing. What about that poor sod who's taken ill? Your mother might find his moaning and groaning a bit off-putting...

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: I was just about to mention that. An Ala Mhigan fellow on his way home from Gridania stayed overnight, but he's come down with sssomething. We can't tell what's caused it, but he's in a terrible state.

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: At first, we thought the shortness of breath and flushed cheeks were just signs of fatigue. We normally give medicinal tea in cases like this, but that hasn't seemed to work.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: We'll have to try sssomething else.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Hark! Is that the sound of damsels in distress? Fear not! Your cries of despair will not go unanswered! For the future nunh of the M tribe, M'zhet Tia, has arrived!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: What are you doing, J'olhmyn? Is that any way to treat your would-be savior?

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Savior? You can “save” me the trouble of trouncing you again by buggering off and never coming back!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Unghhh... Not quite the welcome I was expecting. Wait─is that you, Forename?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You're looking bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I'm amazed you're not dead yet.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: And you're looking well too! You know, when I signed up to assist the Gatekeepers, I didn't expect to see you here!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Ha ha! Amazing people is my specialty! So you're helping the Gatekeepers too, eh? It's true what they say. Great minds think alike!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: You two have met before?

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Ssso that's how you know each other...

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Know? Our bond goes beyond that of mere acquaintances. Why, we're like siblingsbrothers!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: If you're siblingsbrothers, it's clear to see which one got all the brains. Is he always this ssstupid?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Ahem! I think we can discuss my virtues some other time. Captain Alpa, am I to understand a man has been struck down with a fever of some kind? If so, I may have useful information to impart.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Go on then, tell usss!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: This unfortunate soul is lovesick! I'm absolutely certain of it!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: J'olhmyn! Your violent outbursts notwithstanding, I must admit you possess a rather charming demeanor. Perhaps your convalescent guest has fallen for your feminine wiles and cannot bring himself to part from you!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: My “feminine wiles”? I'm a soldier. Hardly the sort that has secret admirers.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Now, now! There's no need to be shy. If you ask me, you're the belle of the Resistance!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: M'zhet, what were you saying about our guest being “lovesick”? What kind of love makes you sssick?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: The romantic kind, of course! A love that unites those destined to spend eternity together, awakening their true potential. There is nothing it cannot conquer!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: But don't take my word for it. I will demonstrate the power of love! Come to Pike Falls and bear witness to its splendor.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Remember these? That's right─they're grenades left behind by the Garleans.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: I want you to throw them at me just like last time!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Ssstop this nonsense! You'll get yourself killed!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Killed? I think not. I have the power of love on my side! Watch closely everyone─especially you, J'olhmyn. These explosions will be like water off an eft's back!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: (I nearly died the last time I tried this, but you needn't worry! I've definitely removed enough of the powder. Yes, no doubt about it.)

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Forename, I'm ready. Just keep flinging those grenades, even if I tell you stop!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Why are we here?

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: I have no idea what's going on, but there's one thing I'm certain of: he's the biggest idiot I've ever met. And I've met a lot of idiots.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Don't hesitate! Just throw!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Aaaiiieeeeeeeee!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Ack! Gah! (Did I forget to take out some of the powder?) I'm perfectly fine! Let's try that again, Forename!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: I don't think thisss is going to end well...

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Aaaaaah!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: What are you throwing it at me for? That ssstings, you know!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Yaaaaaah!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Stop that, would you? M'zhet's the one with a death wish around here, not me!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: (At least we know that taking out some of the powder results in a nonlethal explosion!)

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: That had a bit more “bang” than I was expecting. Could you try throwing another one?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Gaaaaaaaaagh!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: This seems like quite a dangerous way to prove the power of love. Why don't you just write a poem or something?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Nnngh... That one was a full-sized explosion as well! Forename, stop for a moment!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Are you really going to throw that?

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: That looked really painful. Is the next one ready?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Forget what I said at the beginning! I really do want you to stop!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Aaaaaarrrggghhh!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: No... I had so much to live for...

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: He's not dead, is he?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: I cannot die here! Not today, not like this. The M tribe needs me!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Hooray! He's alive! And it's all because of the power of love!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Did the power of love really protect you from being blown to pieces? Perhaps your feelings for me are genuine after all...

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: What!? No, no! You've got it all wrong! One day I'll be nunh, and I'll have to serve the needs of every eligible woman in the tribe. I can't commit to just one girl!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: So that means the reason you survived has nothing to do with love. It must be something else... Well, even if you did have eyes for me, I'd poke them out with my spear.

dialogue.name: GALES
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, Alpa. A certain matter has come to light and─

dialogue.name: GALES
dialogue.text: Who's this?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: A lonely tia doomed to a life of solitude.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: A misguided fool whose attempts to impress J'olhmyn failed miserably.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: That's entirely inaccurate!

dialogue.name: GALES
dialogue.text: There's no need to be ashamed. You're not alone. My attempts to woo members of the fairer sex always end in disaster... I'll never find a wife at this rate.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Gods be good! A man can reach your age and still be a bachelor?

dialogue.name: GALES
dialogue.text: In my line of work, I meet women from far and wide. But as soon as I try to talk to them, they run a malm.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: The same thing happens to me! Except in my case, I think they find my exuberant nature a tad overwhelming... Come friend, let us share our woes!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Why do I get the feeling this was a complete waste of time? And we're not an ilm closer to helping our bedridden patron. Perhaps we should consult a proper chirurgeon.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Now that you mention it, M'zhet's injuries might need some attention too. Although he ssseems rather well considering...

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Forget about him, he'll be fine. He's got Gales's shoulder to cry on now. Let's go to the Reach and ask Orella. She'll know what to do.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Would I be correct in guessing this isn't a social call?

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: I can't say for sure, but it sounds like he's fallen victim to pleurisy.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: The medicine he needs is fairly simple to make, but unfortunately my supply of lightning cap mushrooms has been exhausted. I'll need you to gather some from East End. Once I've got my things together, I'll go straight to Velodyna.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Understood! J'olhmyn, stay with Orella and keep her sssafe!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: You've met Orella before, haven't you?

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: Sadly, Alpa counts as one of Orella's “regulars.” She's forever eating things she finds lying around and then wondering why she gets a stomachache. Orella's medicine usually sorts her out though.

dialogue.name: GALES
dialogue.text: I can't believe I've found someone whose lack of romantic experience rivals my own!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: To think that Gales is still single after all these years! What is the world coming to?

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: While the disease is not life-threatening, I'm sure our patient would prefer that we avoid any unnecessary dillydallying.

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: No harm will come to Orella or her expensive-looking medical supplies as long as she's with me!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: <pant> I'm lucky you arrived when you did. I know I'm not much of a fighter, but I didn't expect to be beaten by those ssstraggly-looking beasties!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Ssstill, I managed to get the lightning caps! We'd better get these to Orella right away!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are. I've handed the mushrooms to Orella, who is brewing her concoction as we ssspeak. All we can do now is wait.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: What's taking Orella so long? I hope everything's all right...

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Have a little faith, Alpa! Ah, here they come now!

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: You'll be pleased to hear that the treatment was a success.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: How do you feel?

dialogue.name: TRAVELLER03039
dialogue.text: That medicine worked wonders! One moment I'm at death's door, and the next I'm right as rain! Nothing can stop me finishing the last leg of my journey now.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Just don't overexert yourself, do you hear? It's still too early to say you've fully recovered. If you get so much as a runny nose, be sure to come and see me.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: Orella, we appreciate you coming all the way here. Eshana will arrange an essscort back to the Reach.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Well, I'd say that came to a satisfactory conclusion!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: <sigh> No thanks to you!

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: But I could've sworn he showed signs of being lovesick...

dialogue.name: TRAVELLER03039
dialogue.text: <gasp> How did you know?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Know what?

dialogue.name: TRAVELLER03039
dialogue.text: That I'm in love! I've never beheld such grace, such elegance, such...unfathomable beauty! Surely, she is an incarnation of Menphina herself!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: That's very flattering, but you're embarrassing me!

dialogue.name: TRAVELLER03039
dialogue.text: My fever may be gone, but I yet yearn for your healing touch to ease my aching heart! Orella, my love, wait for meeeeee!

dialogue.name: JOLHMYN
dialogue.text: I...I beg your pardon!?

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: Don't get downhearted! “Plenty more sea in the fish” and all that!

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: If you ask me, this “love” thing all seems rather sssilly. As far as I can tell, it leads to a lot of unnecessary bother.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: In just a short ssspan of time, we've had a guest fall ill, I've nearly been eaten by carnivorous plants, and M'zhet has been blown up and beaten several times.

dialogue.name: ALPA
dialogue.text: I'd say it's high time this place had its own infirmary. We should get it ready before Mother returns.

dialogue.name: MZHETTIA
dialogue.text: My, my! While Gales and I were exchanging sob stories, it looks like you've been rather busy.

dialogue.name: GALES
dialogue.text: M'zhet has such a cheerful outlook despite losing his father at such a young age. My own problems pale in comparison.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Castellum Velodyna now has its own infirmary.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Honored reputation with the Vira.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: New Vira tribal daily quests are now available from Eshana at Castellum Velodyna.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Eshana as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for tribal quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Eshana. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Madhura.
